full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Notice Title and Reference

* **Title (English):** W2037-230020-003 RISO Lumber Supply
* **Title (French):** W2037-230020-003 OCIR Matériaux de bois
* **Reference Number:** WS3992640504-Doc3992656486
* **Solicitation Number:** WS3992640504

## Tender Details

* **Closing Date:** June 15, 2023, at 14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** October 26, 2022
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None
* **Tender Status:** Expired
* **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, and others.

## Tender Requirements

* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Region:** New Brunswick, and delivery will be made to 5th Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick.

## Tender Description

The Government of Canada invites bids for a Regional Individual Standing Offer (RISO) for the provision of a variety of lumber to 5th Canadian Division Support Base (5 CDSB) Gagetown in Oromocto, New Brunswick. The offer will be issued on an as and when requested basis, during the period from Standing Offer issued to 31 October 2024 inclusive, divided into six (6) rebid periods for six standing offer periods of four months each. The estimates are for evaluation purposes only.

## Contact Information

* **Contact Name:** Maryse Cyr (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email:** maryse.cyr@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* **Contact Information URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16278841?extsite=MTYyNzg4NDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

## Additional Information

* SQ Register Number: W2037-230020-003
* Solicitation Number: WS3992640504
* Tender Description: A regional standing offer for a variety of lumber with terms of delivery and quantities outlined in the [attached Tenderer's Package - Basis of Payment].
